html:
{% set current_date = frappe.utils.nowdate() %} {% set formatted_date = frappe.utils.formatdate(current_date, "dd-MM-yyyy") %}

Date: {{ formatted_date or '' }}


Dear {{ doc.applicant_name or '' }},


Address:

{{ doc.custom_current_address or '' }}



Thank you very much for taking interest to join our company and discussions we had with you. We appreciate your candidature however because of limited vacancies we could not consider you for which we regret. We have placed your CV in our active file. We wish all the best for your future endeavors.



Best Wishes





For {{ doc.custom_company or '' }}

Authorized Signatory
name: Regret Letter
